title: Tyler1 = Dunkey 2.0?
body:
Or am I wrong?

P.S. Never knew who Tyler1 was until looking at the boards.

replies.body:
Maybe in the way that his fanbase defended his behavior but other than that no.

Dunkey got a 14 day ban then quit because he found he just wasn't having fun with league anymore.

Tyler1 got a bunch of accounts perma banned then himself perma banned as a person. And he is still going to try to play.
Dunkey decided to quit LoL after reflecting on it during a 14-day ban. He's still allowed to come back if he ever wants to.

dunky is just not happy about how rito didnt support him for all his work contributed to the community.

Tylor1 is just a jerk

Same. 

As far as I'm concerned he's just another nobody that got his ass grassed.

I support the ban because salty threads are best threads.

> [{quoted}](name=Bow hunter 16,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=rElNxBsd,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-04-30T06:55:58.079+0000)
>
> OMG I LOVE YOUR FEK AVATAR! AND I KNOW ITS A MTG CARD TOO!
> 
> And its bugging me not knowing WHICH card it is now, probably one from WAY back though which makes me not knowing what card it is not suprising though. But I swear I've seen it before!
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Time Walk, its power 9.  I love meat skeletons.
*goes to gathere.com* Damn! That is one old card! I had a felling it was a blue card in my gut.
I have a feeling this will be the case. NOTE: I wasn't around for the Dunkey ban or whatever it was.
